mapper.select: select t1.*, (select lang.field_value from sys_language lang where lang.table_name='sys_menu' and lang.field_name='name' and lang.table_id=t1.pid and lang.language=#{language}) as parentName, (select lang.field_value from sys_language lang where lang.table_name='sys_menu' and lang.field_name='name' and lang.table_id=t1.id and lang.language=#{language}) as name from sys_menu t1 where t1.id = #{id}
select t3.permissions from sys_role_user t1 left join sys_role_menu t2 on t1.role_id = t2.role_id left join sys_menu t3 on t2.menu_id = t3.id where t1.user_id = #{userId} order by t3.sort asc
